SEARCH
Package service.impl

Class AuthenticationServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
service.impl.AuthenticationServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
AuthenticationService
@Service public class AuthenticationServiceImpl extends Object implements AuthenticationService
Implementation of AuthenticationService. Handles user authentication, session management, and password changes.
Since:
2025-10-07
Version:
1.0
Author:
SC2002 SCED Group-6

      public User getActiveSession(String userId)
      Gets an active session for a user.
      Parameters:
      userId - The user ID
      Returns:
      The User object if session exists
      Throws:
      UnauthorizedException - if no active session
